Ie Security Bugs Fixed

21 Apr 1999

Microsoft has finally gotten around to fixing a trio of bugs that affect security in IE5 and IE4. One of the major ones was a fix for a bug that allowed web developers to view the contents of a viewers clipboard.. Download at http://www.microsoft.com/windows/ie/security/mshtml.asp More info can be found http://www.news.com/News/Item/0,4,0-35492,00.html?st.ne.fd.mdh
